page.title: 17CHILDRENS GAMES (CONT)
page.content: SLAPS and KNUCKLES (both speed reaction games and quite painful!) and marbles. Here is how two local games are played. {KERBY.}Kerby is played in a quiet side street which has kerbs.It is a game for two or four players. The object of the game is to throw a ball across the road so that it hits the kerb on the opposite side and bounces back across the central line. Throws alternate unless a point is scored when the suceesful team continues. The game is won when the nominated winning score is reached. {NIBS}(MARBLES). Nibs is played by two or more players using nibs(marbles) and a hole about five centimetres in diameter called a pog.The game is started by someone calling foggy or fogs, the first person to call going first.
